attributes.action: Have all bins be collected on a weekly basis instead of every 2 weeks
attributes.background: Ive had enough of our bins constanly be overflowing.They used to be emptied every week and now black is emptied one week and the red and green another week .The average household in the uk  goes through 1 tonne of waste every year .So having bins be collected every two weeks is nowhere near enough .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Bin collection is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
